subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray employed crosscourt forehands and drop shots to run John Isner out of Australian Open, 7-6 (4), 6-3, 6-2, and advance to the quarterfinals.
snippet: Andy Murray employed crosscourt forehands and drop shots to run John Isner out of Australian Open, 7-6 (4), 6-3, 6-2, and advance to the quarterfinals.
